share on x peter farina. jun 21 at 2:38 pm filomena "lena" de francesco was added to the . comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x peter farina. jun 21 at 2:38 pm francescantonio galeazza was added to the . comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x peter farina. jun 21 at 2:37 pm i was really sorry to hear about aunt mary lou... and even more sorry that my wife and i can't be stateside for the funeral to see her one last time. she was the last of "that generation" for the galeazza clan so it's a particularly heavy loss to have in the family. i will miss her. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... calling hours. jun 23. 4:00 pm - 7:00 pm betz, rossi & bellinger family funeral home171 guy park avenue. amsterdam, ny, usget order flowers now for mary lou's calling hours mass of christian burial. jun 24. 11:15 am our lady of mount carmel roman catholic church. st. john street amsterdam, ny us 12010. john street amsterdam, ny, us, 12010. get order flowers now for mary lou's mass of christian burial wall facebook google+ betz, rossi, bellinger & stewart family funeral homes website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
